pages.text: Maintaining your magical equipment has become a task in itself. Carrying around all the types of pigment you need is also a major space hog in your inventory.$(br)Now that you're familiar with Pigment, you see no reason to lug it around like you did in the Middle Ages. You've accumulated so much knowledge, survived so many hardships and misfortunes!

It's time for a new creation: the Pigment Palette. Now you are a true Artist of Color.$(br)The Pigment Palette is capable of absorbing, compressing and storing the elemental magics of $(l:/general/pigment)Pigments$(/l). The Pigment Palette, as a single piece of equipment, is able to supply all your magical devices and equipment with suitable pigment.$(br)The only drawback: deprived of their mundane form, there is no way to transform the pigments back into physical form.
